snippet: The scoutmaster, Geoffrey McGrath, says he did not seek the media attention that resulted in his firing.
abstract: Boy Scouts of America dismisses Geoffrey McGrath, gay scoutmaster in Seattle who is married to his longtime companion, nearly a year after announcing that it would admit gay scouts but still prohibit openly gay leaders.
lead_paragraph: The scoutmaster, Geoffrey McGrath, says he did not seek the media attention that resulted in his firing.

headline.main: Boy Scouts Dismiss a Gay Troop Leader in Seattle
headline.print_headline: Boy Scouts Dismiss a Gay Troop Leader in Seattle
